description:
Job Title: Purchasing Clerk (Contract, 5+ Months) Location: Whittier, CA Job Type: Contract (5+ Months) Pay: $26/hr dependent on expereince
About the Role: LHH is seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Purchasing Clerk to join our client's team on a contract basis for a minimum of 5 months. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in procurement and purchasing, with hands-on experience using NetSuite. This role is critical in ensuring our supply chain operations run smoothly and efficiently. Key Responsibilities:
  • Process purchase orders and maintain accurate records of purchases and pricing.
  • Communicate with suppliers to ensure timely delivery of goods and resolve any issues that may arise.
  • Monitor inventory levels and place orders as needed to maintain optimal stock levels.
  • Coordinate with various departments to understand purchasing needs and requirements.
  • Review and analyze vendor quotes, ensuring the best possible terms and pricing.
  • Maintain and update purchasing records and reports.
  • Assist in negotiating contracts with suppliers.
  • Utilize NetSuite to manage purchasing processes and ensure data accuracy.
Qualifications:
  • Proven experience as a Purchasing Clerk or in a similar role.
  • Proficiency in NetSuite is required.
  • Strong understanding of supply chain procedures.
  • Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
  • Strong communication and negotiation skills.
  • Attention to detail and ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
  • High school diploma or equivalent; further education or certification in supply chain management or a related field is a plus.
benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance, 401(k), Paid maternity leave
